name: BeeBeeQ
description:
BeeBeeQ is an asymmetric local multiplayer game where one VR player controls a Chef while up to four xbox controller players control Bees. Armed with a spatula and a fly swat the VR chef player has to try cook while the bees steal food, sting and generally harass him.Includes
  • 5 Player gameplay with 4 player splitscreen.
  • 4 colorful environments.
  • Multiple game modes.
    • Featuring
  • A vivid VR avatar brought to life by the player and AI
  • Spectacular environments by Martin Ashford
  • Original soundtrack by Andy Guy (humanfilm)
  • Fluid flight controls
